title.text: Truth from Trash How Learning Makes Sense Embodied Conversational Agents edited by Converging Methods for Understanding Reading and Dyslexia Learnability in Optimality Theory Toward a Cognitive Semantics Volume 1: Concept Structuring Systems Volume 2: Typology and Process in Concept Structuring

abstractContent.text: Describes both normal and impaired reading processes: how reading ability is acquired, how it is sometimes lost, and how dyslexia can be remediated.
"Arguably the most clear-minded and far-reaching current research program on the application of formal learning theory to the problem of language acquisition."-Stefano Bertolo, MIT 172 pp.
